pathAssistantSteps.info:
Reponsible -> Support team member Case Owner

﻿

For incidents:

  • Analyze and provide a solution to the case.
  • Once the change is implemented mark the In Production field as true.
  • Continue with next step (Validation).
  • Select Production Validation Sub-State

Responsible -> User who created the case

  • In the description field, make sure that the information entered is as complete as possible.
  • For incidents attached images with error.


Reponsible -> Support team member who will manage the case

  • For incidents Change the Case Owner: Helpdesk Incidents and Inquiries Queue -> User who will manage the case.

Reponsible -> Support team member Case Owner

  • Be sure to select the correct Sub Status. For example if you require more information from the user who created the case you should select Sub Status Information.
  • Make your queries to the user via the post in Chatter.
  • If the case have all information, continue with next step (In Progress).

Reponsible -> Support team member Case Owner


For incidents:

  • ﻿Ask the User who created the case to approve the delivered solution using the Submit for approval button
